actionable_tasks.title: Complete MongoDB TTL Indexes
actionable_tasks.description: Finish implementing MongoDB TTL indexes at 50% progress. TTL indexes automatically expire documents after a specified time, useful for logs, sessions, or temporary data in EchoTune AI.
implementation_steps: Identify collections needing TTL (e.g., chat logs, sessions).
Add TTL indexes via MongoDB shell or Mongoose schema: db.collection.createIndex({ "createdAt": 1 }, { expireAfterSeconds: 3600 }).
Test expiration by inserting sample docs and verifying deletion after TTL.
Update any existing indexes to avoid conflicts.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Testing Coverage to 70%
actionable_tasks.description: Increase automated test coverage from ~45% to >70% target, focusing on MCP endpoints, providers health, and chat interface using Jest.
implementation_steps: Run coverage report: npm test -- --coverage.
Prioritize untested paths in MCP endpoints and provider failover.
Write 5-10 new Jest tests for key functions (e.g., failover logic, health checks).
Refactor code for testability if needed (e.g., extract pure functions).
Re-run coverage and commit if >70%.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement p50/p95 Metrics in Performance Monitoring

implementation_steps: Install percentile calc library if needed (e.g., simple-stats).
Extend existing metrics collector to bucket response times.
Add endpoints or logs for p50/p95 queries (e.g., sort and slice array).
Integrate into dashboard or console output.
Test with load simulation (e.g., artillery.io).
